Definition.WordDefinition: INVENTOR, n. A person who makes an ingenious arrangement of wheels, levers and springs, and believes it civilization.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Inventor \In*vent"or\, n. [L.: cf. F. inventeur.] One who invents or finds out something new; a contriver; especially, one who invents mechanical devices, new drugs, new processes, or other useful objects or procedures. [1913 Webster +PJC]
inventor n : someone who is the first to think of or make something [syn: {discoverer}, {artificer}]
